hero.title: Voice to Text
hero.subtitle: Privacy-focused voice-to-text app with offline support.

features.title: Real-time transcription
features.description: Live partial and final results while you speak.

features.title: Open source
features.description: Full source code on GitHub. Transparent and community-driven.

features.title: Global hotkeys
features.description: Start or stop recording from anywhere.

features.title: Auto-copy
features.description: Final text is copied to your clipboard.

features.title: Multilingual
features.description: Interface in 6 languages with multi-language speech recognition.

features.title: Offline mode
features.description: Full transcription without internet using local Whisper models.

features.title: Auto-updates
features.description: Seamless updates delivered automatically via GitHub Releases.

features.title: Voice detection
features.description: Smart WebRTC VAD filters silence and background noise.

features.title: System tray
features.description: Runs quietly in the background, always one click away.

features.title: Auto-paste
features.description: Transcription is pasted directly into any active text field.

providers.name: Superior Accuracy
providers.description: 54.3% reduction in word error rate for streaming and 47.4% for batch processing compared to competitors.

providers.name: Real-time Multilingual
providers.description: First voice AI model to offer real-time multilingual transcription across multiple languages.

providers.name: Self-serve Customization
providers.description: Instant vocabulary adaptation without model retraining — highly accurate and effective.

providers.name: Enterprise Ready
providers.description: Extended capabilities for real-world enterprise use cases and challenging audio conditions.

providers.name: Preferred over Whisper
providers.description: Preferred on 7 out of 7 languages tested — up to 8-to-1 preference on certain languages.

openSource.title: Fully open source
bullets: Source code available on GitHub — inspect, modify, and build freely
Community-driven development with open issues and contributions
Licensed under MIT — use in personal and commercial projects
openSource.note: Transparency and trust through open code.

faq.question: How do I use my own API keys?
faq.answer: Add keys in Settings and keep them local.

faq.question: How do I change the hotkey?
faq.answer: Update it in Settings inside the app.

faq.question: Is the project open source?
faq.answer: Yes, the full source code is available on GitHub under the MIT license.

download.title: Download
download.note: Choose your platform and install in minutes.

pricing.name: Free
pricing.description: Get started with offline transcription at no cost.

pricing.name: Pro
pricing.description: Unlock cloud providers for maximum accuracy and speed.

pricing.name: Team
pricing.description: For teams that need shared access and admin tools.
